channel.title: How to dix equipment slots for equipment!
channel.description: okay, well i want to no how to fix the equipment slots because i took files of custom items, imported them into my server,and started to spawn them in my inventory. This is what works: -spawn correctly -can equip -can use correctly what doesn't work:-some items like helmets equip into weapon slots -ex. custom santa hat
